alert.note: Alert for Gilchrist; Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 10:12PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Gilchrist, west central Columbia, Suwannee and western Hamilton Counties through 1115 PM EDT... At 1012 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles south of Quitman to 10 miles west of Dowling Park to near Steinhatchee. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Live Oak, Jasper, Trenton, Jennings, Bell, Suwannee River State Park, Suwannee Springs, Ichetucknee Spring, Crossroads and Mcalpin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Gilchrist; Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Suwannee
